data.title: Concert in the Gardens : Edinburgh's Hogmanay 2023
data.meta_description: Edinburgh's Hogmanay is where the world comes to party, a 3 day festival to celebrate the New Year
data.text:
21:00 – 00:50

West Princes Street Gardens

Ticket details to be announced

12+

Concert in the Gardens headliners and ticket information available late summer 2024…

The Concert in the Gardens on Tuesday 31 December 2024, welcomes party-people from around the globe to dance their way into 2025 at the world-famous music and firework spectacular.

our headline artist will perform the last show of 2024 and first of 2025, bringing in the bells beneath the majestic backdrop of Edinburgh Castle.

In 2023, Pulp performed a hit filled set of career spanning pop anthems including Common People, Disco 2000, and Do You Remember the First Time? to a sold-out audience of 10,000 people, beneath the backdrop of Edinburgh Castle amidst one of the world’s greatest New Year firework displays.

Previous artists include Biffy Clyro, Paolo Nutini, Pet Shop Boys, Blondie, Madness, Calvin Harris, Kasabian and many, many more.

Subscribe to the Edinburgh’s Hogmanay Newsletter below, to receive announcements and be the first to know about this year’s Concert in the Gardens

Event info

Take part in the magnificent Midnight Moment with fireworks and music as we say farewell to 2023 and party into 2024

Taking place in West Princes Street Gardens and set against the backdrop of the iconic Edinburgh Castle, watch firework displays on the hour from 9 pm until the all-important Midnight moment as we welcome 2024

Access to premium outdoor bars, street food and dedicated toilet facilities within the Gardens

There are two main entrances into the Concert in the Gardens, plus an accessible entrance from Lothian Road

South Gate – Bank Street (down the Mound into Princes St Gardens via the Floral Clock Gardens Gate)

West Gate – Princes Street (west-end into Princes St Gardens via West-end Gardens Gate)

Accessible Gate – Kings Stables Road (St Cuthberts Church into Princes St Gardens via Golden Gates)

Please note:

Concert in the Gardens is an all-standing outdoor event in winter, and please be prepared for a very busy event and winter weather

Concert in the Gardens takes place in a designated event arena in West Princes Street Gardens, and tickets DO NOT permit entry into the Street Party arena.

Entry to the Concert in the Gardens is separate to the Street Party gates – please confirm your preferred entrance gate when you book tickets.

For safety reasons, no under 12’s are permitted at the Concert in the Gardens or Street Party events.

Anyone under 16 years must be accompanied by an adult over 18 years of age

No alcohol can be brought into the Concert in the Gardens event; there are bar and food facilities available at the event

Re-entry to the Concert in the Gardens is NOT permitted (i.e. leaving the Concert in the Gardens event arena and then trying to regain admittance)

Please arrive early, doors open at 8 pm, and the stage is live from 9 pm. Late arrival may result in having to queue for entry

This event has a strict NO-DRONE policy

Avoid bringing any bags larger than a sheet of A3 paper (297mm x 420mm)

Please note, in the interests of safety, Event Organisers reserve the right to conduct security searches of bags and clothing on entry

Ticket types

Enclosure tickets:

Exclusive premium standing viewing area (hard-standing) directly in front of the Concert stage, set beneath Edinburgh Castle, offering an amazing view of the stage and great views of the fireworks

Gardens tickets:

Premium standing viewing area (Gardens surrounding Enclosure) within the Concert arena set beneath Edinburgh Castle offering an amazing view of the stage with one of the best views of the fireworks

PREMIUM AREA: Limited Availability

Exclusive access to a designated Premium Viewing Platform overlooking the enclosure, set beneath Edinburgh Castle, offering an amazing view of the stage with THE best view of the Midnight Fireworks

Premium Bar and Food facilities located within the Premium Viewing Area for use by Premium Ticket Holders only

Toilet facilities located within the Premium Viewing Area for use by Premium Ticket Holders only

PLEASE BE AWARE THAT TICKETS FOR CONCERT IN THE GARDENS AND EDINBURGH’S HOGMANAY STREET PARTY ARE SEPARATE EVENTS. PURCHASING TICKETS FOR THE CONCERT IN THE GARDENS DOES NOT GRANT ACCESS TO THE STREET PARTY.
